text.name: sys_description
text.text: This is a continuation of Final Burn Alpha created in 2004 by TrebbleWinner, itself based on Final Burn created in 2000 by Dave and become FB-Neo in 2019. This project has become over time one of the best emulator Arcade available, thanks to Lantus and IQ_132 for their various optimizations. It is updated very often and emulates different systems such as MVS, CPS1, CPS2, System 16, System 18, X Board, Y Board of Sega, and a whole list of Cave Toaplan, Taito, Psikyo and Kaneko. Just like MAME it offers the features of graphic shaders, savestates, etc ...
